title: Project 2 - Modal
content:
## DOM Modal



>  Key Concepts
* document.getElementById()
* addEventListener()
* e.target()
* CSS Styling through JavaScript
* CSS Animation


### Steps

1. Write the HTML Open Button, Modal Container, Inner Modal and Close Button
2. Style the Elements Above and Position them using Relative > Absolute Notation
3. Hide Modal by Default
4. Add Event Listener to the Open button and apply CSS via JS, Start with display block
5. Add Event Listener to Close and Window, Apply display None
6. Assign Keyframe animation and assign it to target modal
